title: rustdoc: unknown flag 'skip-rustdoc-fingerprint' with download-rustc

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I have `download-rustc` enabled in my config.toml, and when I run `./x.py doc library/std`, I get the error `error: unknown -Z flag specified: skip-rustdoc-fingerprint`.

[config.toml diffs from config.toml.example](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/files/6565667/patch.txt)

This reproduces across pulling master a few different times. Currently I'm on 84b1005bfd22e2cb2a4c13b0b81958fe72628354 and it still reproduces.

```
$ ./x.py doc library/std
Updating only changed submodules
Submodules updated in 0.03 seconds
downloading https://ci-artifacts.rust-lang.org/rustc-builds/84b1005bfd22e2cb2a4c13b0b81958fe72628354/rust-std-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz
############################################################################################################################################################################################################ 100.0%
extracting /home/jsha/rust/rust/build/cache/84b1005bfd22e2cb2a4c13b0b81958fe72628354/rust-std-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz
downloading https://ci-artifacts.rust-lang.org/rustc-builds/84b1005bfd22e2cb2a4c13b0b81958fe72628354/rustc-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz
############################################################################################################################################################################################################ 100.0%
extracting /home/jsha/rust/rust/build/cache/84b1005bfd22e2cb2a4c13b0b81958fe72628354/rustc-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz
downloading https://ci-artifacts.rust-lang.org/rustc-builds/84b1005bfd22e2cb2a4c13b0b81958fe72628354/rustc-dev-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz
############################################################################################################################################################################################################ 100.0%
extracting /home/jsha/rust/rust/build/cache/84b1005bfd22e2cb2a4c13b0b81958fe72628354/rustc-dev-nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.xz
    Finished dev [unoptimized + debuginfo] target(s) in 0.18s
Documenting stage2 std (x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu)
Building rustdoc for stage2 (x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu)
   Compiling libc v0.2.93
   Compiling lazy_static v1.4.0
...
   Compiling rustdoc v0.0.0 (/home/jsha/rust/rust/src/librustdoc)
   Compiling rustdoc-tool v0.0.0 (/home/jsha/rust/rust/src/tools/rustdoc)
    Finished release [optimized] target(s) in 1m 34s
error: unknown `-Z` flag specified: skip-rustdoc-fingerprint


command did not execute successfully: "/home/jsha/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/cargo" "rustdoc" "--target" "x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu" "-Zbinary-dep-depinfo" "-j" "12" "--release" "--features" "panic-unwind backtrace compiler-builtins-c" "--manifest-path" "/home/jsha/rust/rust/library/test/Cargo.toml" "-p" "core" "-Zskip-rustdoc-fingerprint" "--" "--markdown-css" "rust.css" "--markdown-no-toc" "-Z" "unstable-options" "--resource-suffix" "1.54.0" "--index-page" "/home/jsha/rust/rust/src/doc/index.md" "--disable-minification"
expected success, got: exit status: 101


failed to run: /home/jsha/rust/rust/build/bootstrap/debug/bootstrap doc library/std
Build completed unsuccessfully in 0:02:34
```

/cc @jyn514
